instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the adjectives, comparatives, and superlatives.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: Click on each adjective, comparative or superlative you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose an adjective, comparative, or superlative from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct adjective form from the base form, the comparative, or the superlative. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
